content_html: Kakrebihar (Surkhet), Sept 21: Problem has surfaced with three sales outlets of the Food Management and Trading Company Ltd (FMTCL) in Upper Dolpa facing short supply of food grains. The outlets located at Dho, Saldang and Tinje are running out of food grains stock. Chief of Dolpa branch of the Company, Bishnu Ghimire, shared that the sales outl
